data.name: berty
data.description: Berty is a secure peer-to-peer messaging app that works with or without internet access, cellular data or trust in the network

data.name: backdoor-apk
data.description: backdoor-apk is a shell script that simplifies the process of adding a backdoor to any Android APK file. Users of this shell script should have working knowledge of Linux, Bash, Metasploit, Apktool, the Android SDK, smali, etc. This shell script is provided as-is without warranty of any kind and is intended for educational purposes only.
